itemDisplayName: Create an ELB with 2 Virtual Machines in the backend
description: This template creates a virtual network with 3 subnets (server subnet, jumpbox subet and AzureFirewall subnet), a jumpbox VM with public IP, A server VM, UDR route to point to AzuerFirewall for the ServerSubnet and an azure firewall with 1 sample application rule and 1 sample network rule
summary: Create an ELB with 2 Virtual Machines in the backend
